name: Prisma (Salt_Mate, luilinsky, Sarah/Fartuuna, WorldEditTree, VictoriaGalaxia, disgracex3, roku_gatsu)
name_original: Prisma (Salt_Mate, luilinsky, Sarah/Fartuuna, WorldEditTree, VictoriaGalaxia, disgracex3, roku_gatsu)
description:
You are a little character, that wakes up somewhere completely in the dark. You have to find all the fragments of the light to find your way out of this dark place. - Prototype - 

This Prototype was made for the bpb - Gamejam 2021

A, D, Leertaste (Jump)

Mausrad - Wechseln zwischen den Splittern des Prismas 

Mauszeiger - Steuerung des Lichtkegels

"Door, Front, Opening, A" (made by InspectorJ) https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/431117/ Licence: CC BY 3.0

all other sounds are licenced under CC0 1.0
